official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to prohibit the issuance of a citation by the Secretary of Labor after the initial inspection of any coal mine or other mine, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to require the Secretary of Labor to issue a warning notice, instead of a citation, for violations of health or safety rules. Requires such notice to fix a reasonable time of 90 days or more for the abatement of the violation. Directs the Secretary to conduct a followup inspection for abatement of the violation, and to issue a citation if the violation has not been corrected.
